#Bitcoin
cycle defies expectations.  This cycle's wrinkle was 2025 - a mild down year.  A boring pause.

Now we resume.

text:
The famous Tulip Mania lasted 6 months.

Bitcoin is 17 years old.

Tulips roundtripped to baseline and that was that.  Bitcoin has rebounded to new highs after ~5 drawdowns of 80%+, monetizing from 0 value to $2T and counting. 

Very, very different.

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
When
#Bitcoin
reached $1, it was then bound to reach $10.  Once it reached $10, then $100, then $1k, it was certain to reach $10k, then $100k.  

Now people wonder if it will ever reach $1m, and then eventually $10m.

Bitcoin is a deterministic rocket. 

The bigger it gets, the more people it reaches, the more certain it will go higher in time.

text:
This is BTC divided by the S&P 500 index

Interesting pattern...

Bitcoin has ~3 year uptrends, then the trendline breaks in a bear market.  Trendline resets, 3 years of new bull market.

Pattern suggests we just had our bear market.  Now time for 3 year bull? h/t
@Investanswers
